channel.title: How to open .cfg files {tut} with no pics, sorry but its good info
channel.description:
ok, Some people are new to this ''server'' making buisness. So if you made your server, and cant open files like..shops.cfg, teleport.cfg...item.cfg and stuff like that, this is what you do. ____________________________________________________________________________________________
~1.~ First, find the .cfg file you wish to open. ~2.~ Second, right click the icon ~3.~ Third select open with.. ~4.~ click open with other... ~5.~ Then select notepad (recommended) ___________________________________________________________________________________________
There you go, an easy tuturial in 5 simple steps. Now you can edit whatever you please. ____________________________________________________________________________________________
CREDITS: 60% to jagex for making the game 40% to me for making the tuturial :P
~twinke42~

item.title: How to open .cfg files {tut} with no pics, sorry but its good info
item.dc:creator: @twinke42 twinke42
item.description:
@twinke42 wrote:

ok, Some people are new to this ‘‘server’’ making buisness. So if you made your server, and cant open files like…shops.cfg, teleport.cfg…item.cfg and stuff like that, this is what you do.

~1.~ First, find the .cfg file you wish to open.
~2.~ Second, right click the icon
~3.~ Third select open with…
~4.~ click open with other…
~5.~ Then select notepad (recommended)

There you go, an easy tuturial in 5 simple steps. Now you can edit whatever you please.

                                         CREDITS:

60% to jagex for making the game
40% to me for making the tuturial

~twinke42~
